greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Let r+i*s be the sum of the distinct first-quadrant Gaussian integers dividing n; sequence gives r+s values.
comment: Also equal to the sum of all divisors of n (in Z[i]) having positive real part. - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 22 2007
link: M. F. Hasler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000.
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 11 2003
